title: Using Publisher Rocket to Find Keywords for Your Book

tactics.name: Keyword Research with Publisher Rocket
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to find and analyze keywords for book marketing
steps: Enter a general idea or phrase
Analyze keyword metrics like competitors and search volume
caveats: Competitive scores and search data should be contextualized
source_quotes: these suggestions come from amazon's kindle store

tactics.name: Keyword Category Analysis
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to identify high-performing categories and keywords by analyzing BSR ranks and sales data
steps: Search for niche keywords like 'shifter academy romances'
Check BSR ranks and sales figures
Export competition data to Excel for sorting
source_quotes: the lower the number the more sales it's making

heuristics.name: Competitive Score Threshold
heuristics.condition: If competitive score is 20-50, prioritize keyword
source_quotes: competitive score this tells you how hard it would be to rank your book

heuristics.name: Low Competition Targeting
heuristics.condition: If BSR rank is below 10,000 and daily sales are under 50, prioritize keyword
source_quotes: number 10 in the category so the number 10 book

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket provides keyword data from Amazon's Kindle store
source_quotes: these suggestions come from amazon if you've ever typed something into the search bar on amazon

claims.statement: KDP BSR rank correlates with sales volume and category competitiveness
source_quotes: the lower this number is the more sales it's making

niche_patterns.example: shifter academy + reverse harem + niche subgenre
niche_patterns.description: Identify specific subgenres with constrained market opportunities
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Narrow niches reduce competition while maintaining search volume
source_quotes: shifter academy reverse harem romance for those who don't know reverse harem means

niche_patterns.description: Combine character identity, magical elements, and specific settings for niche keywords
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Creates unique marketable combinations with lower competition
source_quotes: woman in a schoolgirl outfit holding like magic like fire
